Name: Pushover - Send a notification
Description: Sends a notification using the Pushover REST API.

Parameters.Name: APIToken
Parameters.Label: Specify the App token as registered in the Pushover Dashboard
Parameters.HelpText: Goto [Create New Pushover Application/Plugin](https://pushover.net/apps/build) and create a token for your application, e.g. Octopus.

Parameters.Name: UserKey
Parameters.Label: The User Key of the Pushover User to send the notification to
Parameters.HelpText: The **User Key** can be found on the [Pushover dashboard](https://pushover.net/) after logging in.

Parameters.Name: Message
Parameters.Label: The message that should be send
Parameters.HelpText: The message that must be displayed in the notification.

Parameters.Name: Title
Parameters.Label: Title
Parameters.HelpText: The title of the notification. When empty, the parameter will be omitted in the Pushover API call.

Parameters.Name: Priority
Parameters.Label: Priority
Parameters.HelpText: The priority of the notification. See Pushover API documentation for valid values.

Parameters.Name: Timeout
Parameters.Label: Timeout in seconds
Parameters.HelpText: The maximum timout in seconds for the request.
